DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics KAI-4169 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male 18 45 year age provide write informed consent Subject judge good health base medical history , physical examination , routine laboratory test History presence significant acute chronic illness ( e.g. , cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , hematologic , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , neurologic disease ) accord investigator History ongoing medical condition require treatment prescription medication History asthma , severe allergy include skin reaction prior anaphylactic type reaction Clinically significant abnormality screen clinical examination laboratory safety test History drug alcohol abuse
